players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I found last night."
You: "Charlie is acting suspiciously and has been quiet so far."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on finding the real mafia among us."
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie further, as his reaction seems suspicious."
Charlie: "I understand your concerns, but I have nothing to hide. Let's trust each other and work together to find the real mafia in our midst."
